document.full_text: unicef named iraqi singer kadhim al-sahir, known as the "czar of arab song," as a goodwill ambassador to iraq on monday.
document.title: iraqi singer kadhim al-sahir named unicef ambassador
lines_and_colors: unicef named iraqi singer kadhim al-sahir, known as the "czar of arab song," as a goodwill ambassador to iraq on monday.
